title: Fabric对macOS系统的支持
content: Fabric Fabric  Twitter                                  crashlytics app                            1 2                                 crashlytics  macOS  macOS             NSApplicationCrashOnExceptions not set  will result poor top level uncaught exception reporting          blockquote      https   docs fabric io apple crashlytics os x html macos support macOS Support    Uncaught Exceptions Intercepting reporting uncaught exceptions macOS complex iOS  macOS  AppKit will catch exceptions thrown main thread  preventing application crashing  preventing Crashlytics reporting them  matters worse  Apple s frameworks not exception safe  means AppKit will prevent app crashing  will likely corrupt process s state  often including AppKit itself  Typically  once exception involving UI interaction thrown  will prevent app working correctly moment on  Thankfully  AppKit little known feature turn behavior predictable  strongly recommend following application  right initialize Crashlytics     codeblock lang objc      NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults  registerDefaults      NSApplicationCrashOnExceptions    YES        endcodeblock    will application s behavior closer iOS  will mean app will crash uncaught exceptions  will allow Crashlytics report useful stack traces  will give ability override behavior user defaults system  even per user basis  course  optional  Crashlytics will warn NSApplicationCrashOnExceptions not set  will otherwise preserve normal AppKit behavior default     endblockquote                MacOS iOS     MacOS AppKit                       crashlytics           Apple s frameworks         AppKit                            AppKit                                                              NSApplicationCrashOnExceptions             iOS                  NSApplicationCrashOnExceptions not set Cause Test Crash           APP                       Xcode                                                  Mac   Xcode            run         APP   Stop  Xcode                     APP          Xcode   run  Xcode    console                       macOS                  private var log system log         Users pyc Library Logs DiagnosticReports APPNAME_2016 11 10 165115 crash    blockquote      https   docs fabric io apple crashlytics test crash html Cause Test Crash      It s possible  rare  missing dSYM symbolicate crash reports  will alert dashboard case  Click upload missing dSYM  Keep mind exceptions not guaranteed crash  full code path  including code system libraries  matters here  aren t seeing dSYM alert  go app s settings page  append   mappings  URL reach it  e g  https   fabric io settings apps someappid mappings    endblockquote

title: swift错误处理
content: Error handling process responding recovering error conditions program  Swift provides first class support throwing  catching  propagating  manipulating recoverable errors runtime  operations aren t guaranteed always complete execution produce useful output  Optionals used represent absence value  when operation fails  it s often useful understand caused failure  so code respond accordingly  example  consider task reading processing data file disk  number ways task fail  including file not existing specified path  file not having read permissions  file not encoded compatible format  Distinguishing among different situations allows program resolve errors communicate user errors can t resolve                                                                                                      Representing Throwing Errors Swift  errors represented values types conform Error protocol  empty protocol indicates type used error handling   swift         Error     Swift enumerations particularly suited modeling group related error conditions  associated values allowing additional information nature error communicated  example  here s represent error conditions operating vending machine inside game  swift                                                                enum VendingMachineError  Error   case invalidSelection case insufficientFunds coinsNeeded  Int  case outOfStock   Throwing error lets indicate something unexpected happened normal flow execution can t continue  use throw statement throw error  example  following code throws error indicate five additional coins needed vending machine                                Throw                            five  throw VendingMachineError insufficientFunds coinsNeeded  5  Handling Errors When error thrown  surrounding piece code responsible handling error for example  correcting problem  trying alternative approach  informing user failure                                                    four ways handle errors Swift  propagate error function code calls function  handle error using do catch statement  handle error optional value  assert error will not occur  approach described section below   swift                           do catch               4                try        When function throws error  changes flow program  so it s important quickly identify places code throw errors  identify places code  write try keyword or try  try  variation before piece code calls function  method  initializer throw error  keywords described sections below its parameters  function marked throws called throwing function  function specifies return type  write throwskeyword return arrow                                       throws          throws   throws
